AmmoDataBulletsHeavy.name: Ammo: Heavy Bullets
AmmoDataBulletsHeavy.description: Ammo for weapons that use high caliber bullets, typically for slow and powerful weapons. You can carry up to 1000 heavy bullets.

AmmoDataBulletsLight.name: Ammo: Light Bullets
AmmoDataBulletsLight.description: Ammo for weapons that use low caliber bullets. Typically used in weapons with a high rate of fire. You can carry up to 6000 light bullets.

AmmoDataBulletsMedium.name: Ammo: Medium Bullets
AmmoDataBulletsMedium.description: Ammo for weapons using mid-range caliber bullets, typically with balanced firepower and rate of fire. You can carry up to 4000 medium bullets.

AmmoDataShells.name: Ammo: Shells 'n' Slugs
AmmoDataShells.description: Ammo for weapons that use all types of shells, such as buckshot or slugs. You can carry up to 1200 shells 'n' slugs.

AmmoInfiniteEnergy.name: Ammo: Energy Cell
AmmoInfiniteEnergy.description: Ammo for weapons that use a power source instead of traditional bullets.
